DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether self-efficacy promote adherence Pelvic Floor Muscle Training ( PFMT ) Bladder Training ( BT ) woman age 55 old .
DOC.brief_title: Promoting Self Care Prevent Urinary Incontinence ( UI ) : A Four-Year Follow-up
DOC.detailed_description: The study design determine capacity self-efficacy predict maintenance practice PFMT BT . Women treatment arm RCT attend Bladder Health Class ( PFMT & BT ) prevent UI . The class content emphasize self-efficacy . At 3-months post intervention self-efficacy participant measure ; result collect analyze predictive capacity training adherence . For four year participants treatment control ( class ) arm follow questionnaire 3-day bladder diary ( 2/year ) clinic evaluation ( 1/year ) . In addition , qualitative analysis narrative Bladder Health Class participant identify individual attitude strategy either facilitate deterred adherence .
DOC.criteria: Women age 55 year old report 5 few episode UI / year , prior treatment UI , neurological disease , difficulty perform activity daily live Less 55 year old , UI episodes great 5 per year , score le 24 Mini Mental Status Examination
